question: And how do you even get started and whether we can get this kind of runaway evolution happening?
What are your thoughts, if I could ask, on the early steps on the Neuralink side?
And does mutation come into play at all in the process and what in the world does it serve?
But do you find this whole space of applications in the robotics interesting for evolution computation?
And maybe what kind of neural networks are more amenable to this kind of idea than others?
Or is it the best, is the multitask idea that you're speaking to that they need to be deeply integrated?
Are those languages that emerge in those different simulated environments, are they understandable to us?
Do you think about this kind of thing, is there impressive demonstration to you of artificial life?
Do you think of the agents that you work with in the evolutionary computation perspective as life?
So try to figure out, I mean, what is the maximally new experience I could have today?
What do you think from that individual agent's perspective is the meaning of it all?
